name: Reflect Raider
description:
Reflect Raider is a throwback to classic GameBoy games. Armed only with a shield, you must pilot your tank to the enemy fortress while under heavy enemy fire. There's no time to stop, as you're under the clock! Can you overcome this retro-themed reflect-em-up before the timer runs out? PLEASE NOTE: The browser version currently doesn't run as well as the stand-alone executable. For the best experience possible, download the offline version of Reflect Raider.

Update 10/14/16: Fixed a small bug where the player would get stuck on walls. New version is v0.7, v0.6 is still available for archival purposes.

Visit our website for great books, music, and games!

FEATURING...

TWO LEVELS

GUN TURRETS

TANKS

EVIL FORTRESSES

RETRO CHIPTUNE BEATS BY DEFCHEF

GRAMMATICAL MISTAKES

AND MORE!
